#Text=Kalutara
#Text=Kalutara is in Western Province ( Sri Lanka ) .
#Text=Understand
#Text=Kalutara is a coastal city 43 km south of the capital Colombo and the administrative capital of Kalutara district .
#Text=The city holds a unique position for one of the four major rivers in Sri Lanka ( Kalu River ) joins the sea at the center of the city .
#Text=By bus
#Text=Take the Colombo-Kalutara route No. 400 AC or Non AC bus from Colombo .
#Text=It 'll take around 2 hours to reach depending on the time of the day .
#Text=Better to travel in the mornings to avoid outbound traffic congestions .
#Text=By train
#Text=Kalutara has two railway stations ( Kalutara North and Kalutara South ) and make sure to get off at Kalutara South station to reach the city .
#Text=Kalutara South station is a major station on the southern coastal railway and all express trains make a stop here .
#Text=Pre-booking facility is only available in Rajadhani Express train .
#Text=See
#Text=Kalutara Vihara or Gangatilaka Vihara , built in the 1960s to the south of the Kalutara Bridge , is Kalutara ’s most dominant landmark .
#Text=The white 3-storey-high stupa at Kalutara Vihara is believed to be the only Buddha stupa in the world which is entirely hollow .
#Text=It contains a smaller dagoba inside .
#Text=The interior of the stupa is decorated with paintings of the Jataka tales about the life of the Buddha .
#Text=Kalutara Bodhiya is one of the most famous sacred and devotional Buddhist sites in Sri Lanka .
#Text=It is one of the 32 saplings of Anuradhapura Sri Maha Bodiya .
#Text=Kalutara Bodiya is on Colombo-Galle road .
#Text=Richmond Castle is a two-storey mansion , built in 1896 , at Palatota .
#Text=Richmond Castle is a 42-acre fruit garden estate that wad built for a wealthy regional governor .
#Text=The architecture is a mix of British and Indian styles , copied from the plans of an Indian Maharaja ’s palace designed by a London architect .
#Text=The entire building is characterized by intricate carvings .
#Text=Calido Beach is a popular beach among tourists due to its natural beauty and scenic views .
#Text=It is a thin strip of preserved land which runs between the Kalu River and the Indian Ocean .
#Text=Asokaramaya Buddhist Temple is a historic Buddhist temple built in 1873 , in Kalutara north .
#Text=Splurge
#Text=Anantara Kalutara Resort , St Sebastian Road , Katukurunda , ☏ +94342220222 , ✉ kalutara.resort@anantara.com .
#Text=141 rooms , suites and pool villas , equipped with yoga and meditation pavilion , kids ' and teens ’ centre , gym , library & water sports centre .
#Text=Starting from US$ 205 .
